div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, Oct. 10, 1909. CHICAGO HEBREW INSTITUTE NIGHT SCHOOL FOR SKILLED WORKERS

body.p: A class of drawing and estimating for Jewish workers in the steamheating and hot-water system trades is being formed in the Institute Trade School. The dates for registration are October 23 and 25. A class in chemistry and boiler and engine room work will also be established. Full information regarding these courses can be obtained at the office of the Institute.
